rules.name: myRule_10
rules.label: Custom Govt Account Creation Without Shipping

value.stringValue:
AND( [Account].Id != null, [Account].CreatedBy_ProfileName__c != 'Integration API', [Account].BillingCountry != null, [Account].Is_Created_From_Lead__c = false, $User.FederationIdentifier != 'vlad7399', $User.FederationIdentifier != 'vars5086',
OR([Account].RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.Company_Standard_RecordTypeName, [Account].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Master', [Account].RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.RBU_Company_RecordTypeName, [Account].RecordType.DeveloperName = '') )

AND( [Account].Id != null, [Account].CreatedBy_ProfileName__c != 'Integration API', [Account].BillingCountry = null, [Account].Is_Created_From_Lead__c = false, $User.FederationIdentifier != 'vlad7399', $User.FederationIdentifier != 'vars5086',
OR([Account].RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.Company_Standard_RecordTypeName, [Account].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Master', [Account].RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.RBU_Company_RecordTypeName, [Account].RecordType.DeveloperName = '') )
